description: The middle member 'b' of the Pythagorean triples (a,b,c) ordered by increasing c.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pythagorean Triple.
mathematica: maxHypo = 122; hypotenuseQ[n_] := For[k = 1, True, k++, p = Prime[k]; Which[Mod[p, 4] == 1 && Divisible[n, p], Return[True], p > n, Return[False]]]; hypotenuses = Select[Range[maxHypo], hypotenuseQ]; red[c_] := {a, b, c} /. {ToRules[ Reduce[0 < a <= b && a^2 + b^2 == c^2, {a, b}, Integers]]}; Sort[Flatten[red /@ hypotenuses , 1], Last[#1] < Last[#2] &][[All, 2]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 23 2012 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
